attributes.action: Extend the Student Loans Scheme to cover those undertaking postgraduate study.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Higher Education contributes to the development of individuals and society.  We believe that extending the Student Loans Scheme to postgraduates, thereby allowing students to defer the current up-front cost of postgraduate study, will benefit those undertaking postgraduate study and society through those able to access funding.  A deferred payment scheme would support those not able to obtain funding and support the completion of postgraduate study for those who wish to undertake it.
